Docs.summary: Base class for handling the schema metadata API.

Protected Function CreateInfo (Optional schemaSrc As ISchema = null, Optional indexSrc As Integer = -1, Optional filterSrc As Func(Of String, Integer, Boolean) = null) As MetadataDispatcherBase.ColInfo
member this.CreateInfo : Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchema * int * Func<string, int, bool> -> Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.MetadataDispatcherBase.ColInfo

Docs.summary: Create a ColInfo with the indicated information and no GetterInfos. This doesn't register a column, only creates a ColInfo. Note that multiple columns can share the same ColInfo, if desired. Simply call RegisterColumn multiple times, passing the same ColInfo but different index values. This can only be called before Seal is called.

Docs.summary: Returns the ColInfo registered for the given column index, if there is one. This may be called before or after Seal is called.

Docs.summary: Gets the metadata for the given metadata kind and column index. Throws if there isn't any. This can only be called after Seal is called.

Docs.summary: Gets the metadata type for the given metadata kind and column index, if there is one. This can only be called after Seal is called.

Docs.summary: Gets the metadata kinds and types for the given column index. This can only be called after Seal is called.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void RegisterColumn (int index, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.MetadataDispatcherBase.ColInfo info);
.method familyhidebysig instance void RegisterColumn(int32 index, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.MetadataDispatcherBase/ColInfo info) cil managed

Docs.summary: Register the given ColInfo as the metadata handling information for the given column index. Throws if the given column index already has a ColInfo registered for it. This can only be called before Seal is called.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void Seal ();
.method familyhidebysig instance void Seal() cil managed
Protected Sub Seal ()
member this.Seal : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Seals this dispatcher from further column registrations. This must be called before any metadata methods are called, otherwise an exception is thrown.
